nodes.text: Errik Darksider was a member of Jabba Desilijic Tiure's criminal empire during the Galactic Civil War.

Circa 1 ABY, Errik Darksider resided in the city of Mos Eisley on Tatooine. While here, he encountered a spacer who he surmised would make a suitable candidate for Jabba's forces. Errik told the spacer that he knew the whereabouts of certain locations on Tatooine, including the Hutt Hideout outside of Mos Eisley. For several credits, Errik agreed to betray Jabba and tell the spacer of Hutt Hideout's location. He also agreed to give the whereabouts of two other locations for additional credits, including a destroyed Rebel Military Base and a bunker overrun by Tusken Raiders.

Errik Darksider is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Players who talk to him may receive the waypoints to three locations on Tatooine, including the Hutt Hideout, a Tusken Bunker, and a destroyed Rebel Military Base. For Errik to give the player the waypoints, the player must agree to pay varying amounts of credits for each location.
